name: Sunshine in a Glass
description: Freshly squeezed orange juice, pure vitamin C delight

name: Classic Lemonade
description: A thirst-quenching mix of fresh lemons and sugar

name: The Crunchy Apple
description: 100% apple juice, a taste of crisp autumn mornings

name: Kiwi Banana Blast
description: A refreshing blend of kiwi and banana

name: The Ruby Refresher
description: Pink grapefruit juice, a burst of tangy goodness

name: Tropical Escape
description: A vibrant mix of papaya, mango, and orange juice

name: The Green Glow
description: A healthy blend of spinach, apple, and ginger

name: The Kickstart
description: A bold espresso shot to jumpstart your day

name: The Night Owl
description: Cold brew for a slow sip, smooth finish

name: The Cloud Whisperer
description: Dreamy blend of espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam

name: The Chocolaty Fix
description: Mocha magic - latte with a delightful chocolate twist

name: Berry Burst
description: Classic pancakes topped with fresh berries and whipped cream

name: Chocolate Chip Delight
description: Buttermilk pancakes studded with chocolate chips, served with chocolate sauce

name: Lemon Blueberry Delight
description: Light and fluffy lemon cake with fresh blueberries and lemon glaze
ingredients: flour, sugar, eggs, fat (butter or oil), lemon (zest and juice), liquids (milk or buttermilk), leavening (baking powder), blueberries, lemon glaze

name: Chocolate Decadence
description: Rich chocolate cake with chocolate ganache frosting
ingredients: flour, cocoa powder, sugar, eggs, fat (butter or oil), milk, chocolate (chips or melted)

name: Classic Carrot Cake
description: Moist carrot cake with cream cheese frosting and walnuts
ingredients: flour, sugar, eggs, oil, carrots, spices (cinnamon, nutmeg), cream cheese frosting, walnuts (optional)

name: Vegetable Omelette
description: A classic omelette filled with your choice of vegetables

name: Blueberry Muffin
description: Freshly baked blueberry muffin

name: Chocolate Frosted Donut with Sprinkles
description: A light and fluffy donut covered in rich chocolate frosting and colorful sprinkles
ingredients: flour, sugar, eggs, milk, chocolate frosting, sprinkles

name: Chocolate Croissant
description: Flaky croissant filled with rich chocolate

name: Cinnamon Roll
description: Warm, gooey cinnamon roll with a sweet glaze
ingredients: dough, cinnamon sugar filling, cream cheese frosting (optional)

name: Millefeuille
description: A classic French pastry with layers of puff pastry and rich pastry cream
ingredients: puff pastry dough, pastry cream, glaze

name: Breakfast Burrito
description: A customizable breakfast wrap filled with scrambled eggs, your choice of cheese, and other delicious options.
ingredients: tortilla, scrambled eggs, black beans, bell peppers, onions, spinach, tomatoes, sour cream, guacamole

name: Avocado Toast
description: Freshly smashed avocado on toasted bread, drizzled with olive oil and seasoned with salt and pepper. Can be customized with additional toppings.
ingredients: avocado, toasted bread, olive oil, salt, pepper, poached egg
